cards.rules_text:
Flying, Vigilance, Haste
Whenever Aurelia attacks, choose one —
• Other attacking creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
• Create an X/X white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance that's attacking, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

Ward—Exile two cards from your graveyard.
When Kull Varis enters or attacks, exile up to three cards from target players graveyard.
You may cast instant, sorcery and creature spells exiled with Kull Varis by discarding a card in addition to paying their other costs.

Haste
Whenever Sun deals combat damage, put a +1/+1 counter on him. Then if his power is 6 or more and there is no monarch, you become the monarch.
Whenever Sun attacks the monarch, he gains trample until end of turn.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a card with mana value X or less, where X is the mana value of the sacrificed creature. Put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Flying
When this creature enters, exile target nonland permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owners control. If a creature is returned to the battlefield this way, it gains haste and vigilance until end of turn.

Whenever a creature you control attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of turn. Whenever a creature card is cast this way, you gain life equal to its mana value.

Flying
Whenever one or more spells target a creature you control, you may copy one of those spells. You may choose new targets for the copy. Do this only once each turn.

cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch, haste
When Vermus attacks, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste and deathtouch and becomes tapped and attacking.

Vigilance
The first instant or sorcery spell with mana value 2 or less you cast each turn has “Gift a tapped fish” and “When you cast this spell, if the gift was promised, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.”

[i]Survival[/i] — At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if The Benevolence is tapped, return up to one target permanent you control with mana value X or less to your hand, where X is the amount of life lost by opponents this turn.

cards.rules_text:

Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may discard any number of cards. This spell costs {2} less for each card discarded this way.
Menace, deathtouch, haste

If creatures your opponents control dealt 7 or more damage to you this turn, this spell costs {3} less and can be cast as though it had Flash.
Gain control of target creature.

cards.rules_text: Starting with the opponent to your right, that player looks at the top two cards of your library, then the next opponent looks at the next top two, and so on. Each opponent then seperates the cards they looked at into a face up and face down pile. Put all face up cards or all face down cards in your hand, then the rest of the cards in your graveyard.
